errors.name: InvalidOwner
errors.msg: Input account owner is not the program address

errors.name: IncorrectLpMint
errors.msg: Address of the provided lp token mint is incorrect

errors.name: ZeroTradingTokens
errors.msg: Given pool token amount results in zero trading tokens

errors.name: InitLpAmountTooLess
errors.msg: Init lp amount is too less(Because 100 amount lp will be locked)

errors.name: CalculationFailure
errors.msg: Calculation failed due to overflow or division by zero

errors.name: InsufficientSandwichAmount
errors.msg: Calculated sandwich amount is too small to be profitable

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump to identify PDA

fields.name: owner
docs: Address of the protocol owner

fields.name: protocol_fee_rate
docs: The protocol fee

fields.name: trade_fee_rate
docs: The trade fee, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: tick_spacing
docs: The tick spacing

fields.name: fund_fee_rate
docs: The fund fee, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

types.name: ClmmObservation
docs: The element of observations in ObservationState

fields.name: block_timestamp
docs: The block timestamp of the observation

fields.name: sqrt_price_x64
docs: the price of the observation timestamp, Q64.64

fields.name: cumulative_time_price_x64
docs: the cumulative of price during the duration time, Q64.64

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for feature update

fields.name: initialized
docs: Whether the ObservationState is initialized

fields.name: observations
docs: observation array

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for feature update

types.name: ClmmPoolState
docs: The pool state
PDA of `[POOL_SEED, config, token_mint_0, token_mint_1]`

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump to identify PDA

fields.name: token_mint_0
docs: Token pair of the pool, where token_mint_0 address < token_mint_1 address

fields.name: token_vault_0
docs: Token pair vault

fields.name: observation_key
docs: observation account key

fields.name: mint_decimals_0
docs: mint0 and mint1 decimals

fields.name: tick_spacing
docs: The minimum number of ticks between initialized ticks

fields.name: liquidity
docs: The currently in range liquidity available to the pool.

fields.name: sqrt_price_x64
docs: The current price of the pool as a sqrt(token_1/token_0) Q64.64 value

fields.name: tick_current
docs: The current tick of the pool, i.e. according to the last tick transition that was run.

fields.name: observation_index
docs: the most-recently updated index of the observations array

fields.name: fee_growth_global_0_x64
docs: The fee growth as a Q64.64 number, i.e. fees of token_0 and token_1 collected per
unit of liquidity for the entire life of the pool.

fields.name: protocol_fees_token_0
docs: The amounts of token_0 and token_1 that are owed to the protocol.

fields.name: swap_in_amount_token_0
docs: The amounts in and out of swap token_0 and token_1

fields.name: status
docs: Bitwise representation of the state of the pool
bit0, 1: disable open position and increase liquidity, 0: normal
bit1, 1: disable decrease liquidity, 0: normal
bit2, 1: disable collect fee, 0: normal
bit3, 1: disable collect reward, 0: normal
bit4, 1: disable swap, 0: normal

fields.name: padding
docs: Leave blank for future use

fields.name: tick_array_bitmap
docs: Packed initialized tick array state

fields.name: total_fees_token_0
docs: except protocol_fee and fund_fee

fields.name: total_fees_claimed_token_0
docs: except protocol_fee and fund_fee

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump to identify PDA

fields.name: disable_create_pool
docs: Status to control if new pool can be create

fields.name: index
docs: Config index

fields.name: trade_fee_rate
docs: The trade fee, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: protocol_fee_rate
docs: The protocol fee

fields.name: fund_fee_rate
docs: The fund fee, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: create_pool_fee
docs: Fee for create a new pool

fields.name: protocol_owner
docs: Address of the protocol fee owner

fields.name: fund_owner
docs: Address of the fund fee owner

fields.name: padding
docs: padding

types.name: CpmmObservation
docs: The element of observations in ObservationState

fields.name: block_timestamp
docs: The block timestamp of the observation

fields.name: cumulative_token_0_price_x32
docs: the cumulative of token0 price during the duration time, Q32.32, the remaining 64 bit for overflow

fields.name: cumulative_token_1_price_x32
docs: the cumulative of token1 price during the duration time, Q32.32, the remaining 64 bit for overflow

fields.name: initialized
docs: Whether the ObservationState is initialized

fields.name: observation_index
docs: the most-recently updated index of the observations array

fields.name: observations
docs: observation array

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for feature update

fields.name: amm_config
docs: Which config the pool belongs

fields.name: pool_creator
docs: pool creator

fields.name: token_0_vault
docs: Token A

fields.name: token_1_vault
docs: Token B

fields.name: lp_mint
docs: Pool tokens are issued when A or B tokens are deposited.
Pool tokens can be withdrawn back to the original A or B token.

fields.name: token_0_mint
docs: Mint information for token A

fields.name: token_1_mint
docs: Mint information for token B

fields.name: token_0_program
docs: token_0 program

fields.name: token_1_program
docs: token_1 program

fields.name: observation_key
docs: observation account to store oracle data

fields.name: status
docs: Bitwise representation of the state of the pool
bit0, 1: disable deposit(vaule is 1), 0: normal
bit1, 1: disable withdraw(vaule is 2), 0: normal
bit2, 1: disable swap(vaule is 4), 0: normal

fields.name: mint_0_decimals
docs: mint0 and mint1 decimals

fields.name: lp_supply
docs: lp mint supply

fields.name: protocol_fees_token_0
docs: The amounts of token_0 and token_1 that are owed to the liquidity provider.

fields.name: open_time
docs: The timestamp allowed for swap in the pool.

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for future updates

fields.name: reward_state
docs: Reward state

fields.name: open_time
docs: Reward open time

fields.name: end_time
docs: Reward end time

fields.name: last_update_time
docs: Reward last update time

fields.name: emissions_per_second_x64
docs: Q64.64 number indicates how many tokens per second are earned per unit of liquidity.

fields.name: reward_total_emissioned
docs: The total amount of reward emissioned

fields.name: reward_claimed
docs: The total amount of claimed reward

fields.name: token_mint
docs: Reward token mint.

fields.name: token_vault
docs: Reward vault token account.

fields.name: authority
docs: The owner that has permission to set reward param

fields.name: reward_growth_global_x64
docs: Q64.64 number that tracks the total tokens earned per unit of liquidity since the reward
emissions were turned on.
